description: Internal alterations including installation of intermediate floors at ground level and within the replacement roof, the removal of existing internal partitions and the provision of new internal partitions; external alterations including replacement roof, alterations to existing window openings at second floor level on the front elevation to provide doors to a new second floor level roof terrace, the provision of windows on the rear elevation, external refurbishment of the building including concrete repairs, repainting and replacement of missing tiles, the removal of side steps to the west of the building; and the conversion of the building from office (Land Use Class B1) to Residential (Land Use Class C3) to accommodate 66 self-contained residential units (18 studios, 23 one-bedroom, 25 two-bedroom flats) with associated car parking and refuge storage.
